Uses of Class
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion.Criterion

Packages that use Criterion
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria Provides classes for the criteria API, which is used to construct database queries based on objects rather than SQL. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion Provides the criterion classes, which together form a Criteria query. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework. 
 

Uses of Criterion in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria

          Returns the List of Criterion for this Criteria.

 Criteria<T> Criteria.add(Criterion criterion)
          Adds a Criterion to filter retrieved query results.
 

Uses of Criterion in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion
 

Subclasses of Criterion in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion
 class BetweenExpression
           Represents a condition restraining a Field value to between two values.
 class BinaryExpression
           Represents a binary logical expression Criterion.
 class InExpression
           Represents a condition restraining a Field value to a specified set of values.
 class LogicalExpression
           Represents a compound Boolean logical expression consisting of two Criterion expressions and a logical operator.
 class NotExpression
           Represents a negation of a Criterion expression.
 class NotNullExpression
           Represents a condition restraining a Field value to not null.
 class NullExpression
           Represents a condition restraining a Field value to null.
 

Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion that return Criterion
static Criterion Conditions.not(Criterion expression)
          Returns a new Criterion consisting of the negation of the given Criterion expression.

static Criterion Conditions.not(Criterion expression)

static LogicalExpression Conditions.or(Criterion lhs, Criterion rhs)
          Returns a new Criterion consisting of the disjunction of the two given Criterion expressions.
